thread.section_title: Flologic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flologic | flologic.com
thread.title: Marvin Solomon

author: Marvin Solomon
title: Marvin Solomon
text: Having the Flologic monitoring provides an extra layer of security in protecting a home owner from water damage due to flooding from a failed plumbing event. With this system any water flow into the home beyond what is scheduled will activate an automatic stoppage of water into the home from the main. Besides buying a fail-safe system, you are also getting the expertise and service of a company that is the best that I have ever experienced. The phone never rings more than twice before you get help from the people that designed the system. They do stand behind it with service and warranty. A must in every home!
